scripts.start_local_win: set DB_HOST=localhost&& set DB_USERNAME=node&& set DB_DATABASE=schulcloud_calendar&& set SCHULCLOUD_ALL_USERS_FOR_UUID=http://localhost:3030/resolve/users/&& set SCHULCLOUD_ALL_SCOPES_FOR_TOKEN=http://localhost:3030/resolve/scopes/&& npm run debug
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DB_HOST=localhost DB_USERNAME=node DB_PASSWORD=node DB_DATABASE=schulcloud_calendar_test mocha --recursive --exit
scripts.test_travis: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DB_HOST=localhost DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_DATABASE=schulcloud_calendar_test mocha --recursive --exit
